channel.title: CVE Feed for Secvisogram -- csaf-validator-service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Secvisogram -- csaf-validator-service

item.title: CVE-2022-47925|2024-08-03T15:02:36.563Z -- secvisogram -- csaf-validator-service
item.description: The validate JSON endpoint of the Secvisogram csaf-validator-service in versions < 0.1.0 processes tests with unexpected names. This insufficient input validation of requests by an unauthenticated remote user might lead to a partial DoS of the service. Only the request of the attacker is affected by this vulnerability.
